alert.note: Alert for Beaver (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 08 at 9:27PM CDT until July 09 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Amarillo TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Cimarron River at Forgan 8N affecting Beaver County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Cimarron River at Forgan 8N. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Expect minor overflows of low lying banks along the cimarron river in northern beaver county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 4.1 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then rise to 4.2 feet early Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.3 feet on 02/25/1971. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 100 PM CDT.
